attributes.action: To take notice and act upon the outcome of online petitions ..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of recent government actions relating to online petitions We the people ask that action should be taken and acted upon in relation to all matters petitioned for ONLINE recent railroading and the overlooking of the voice of the people highlights there is a lack of democracy in the UK today, the government need desperately to listen to the people …..

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
